test_cases.name: create_user
evaluation_criteria: A test that creates a user when name and email are valid
A test that creates a user with optional age omitted
A test that creates a user with age at minimum boundary (0)
A test that creates a user with age at maximum boundary (150)
A test that rejects a request missing required name field
A test that rejects a request missing required email field
A test that rejects a request with empty name value
A test that rejects a request with empty email value
A test that rejects a request with malformed email format (missing @)
A test that rejects a request with age below minimum (negative)
A test that rejects a request with age above maximum (151)
A test that rejects a request with non-integer age value
A test that rejects a request with unexpected additional top-level property
A test that rejects a request using unsupported content type (e.g., text/plain)
A test that rejects a request when required User schema properties are null
A test that validates JSON response matches User schema on success
A test that validates a 400 status code with error message for invalid payload
